Entries.summer_Mon10: Doc's not gonna like how swollen my ankles are, nosiree.$s

Entries.fall_15_2: Gonna be the Stardew Fair tomorrow, @.#$b#Me, participating? Nah. Not something I want to do anymore.
Entries.2_2: Take care of your knees when you've still got them.$s
Entries.15_2: It's nice that Alex is still livin' with us. I need more help than what my dear wife Evelyn can provide some days.
Entries.19_2: I remember when the mines were first being developed. The town was so happy. We needed the economic activity.#$b#Didn't consider how polluting they'd be.$s
Entries.21_2: We didn't have these new electric devices when we were kids. Had to go out and kick a ball about for our entertainment.
Entries.22_2: Pretty sure doc's had me on these meds before and they weren't no help last time...$s

Entries.2_2: Evelyn says I've become more hard of hearing lately.#$e#Lifetime of working in the mines have damaged my ears.
Entries.3_2: I know the young kiddos think they'll replace us old miners with their newfangled technology, but until they've got it I don't believe them.
Entries.4_2: Now doc wants me to cut back on the sodium.#$b#Doc, I'm getting old, does it really matter anymore?
Entries.5_2: When you're my age, all the kids think they can tell you what to do.
Entries.6_2: Ugh, I'm really feeling my age today, @.#$b#Just want to go back to bed.
Entries.7_2: I remember the first TV we bought. Heavy as heck and the images were so blurry. But we watched that thing every night at dinner for years.$h
Entries.15_2: Doc says I might need hearing aids.$s

Entries.2_2: Doc says I might need cataract surgery. @, I'm...I'm not sure.#$b#Does the idea of surgery scare you too?
Entries.3_2: My eyesight isn't what it used to be, @.$s
Entries.6_2: Ugh, I might need cataract surgery...but when?$s
Entries.17_2: %George is grumbling to himself.#$b#'d think your pension would be guaranteed, but it looks like the money men can even screw that up.$s
Entries.19_2: Doc now wants me to stop drinking entirely. *grumbles*.$s
